Other times you know what they're trying to show you because half the scene gets it across, but another half doesn't match: like a shot with a main character staring out at the enemy, a cut to show enemies dying, back to the character now in close up even with some gun flashes, back to more enemies dying - but the character isn't actually holding up his gun.* There's no character development, yet key scenes are built around the assumption that there is. You're clearly supposed to feel empathy for the decisions they have to make, but you've never had a chance to build up any affinity with them in the first place. Not to mention they're all antagonistic towards each other, and yet in the end you're given the impression they've developed close bonds.* It can't decide what it wants to be. It's hyper futuristic in one case (their spacesuits border on high fantasy magic), while very mundane in others (a pretty standard pistol; no face protection on their suits, and some fist fights). It tries to be stylish (the Tarantino or Keanu kind) in some places, but attempts to be more grounded and dramatic (like Armageddon or The Day After Tomorrow) in others, completely failing at both. Sometimes it borderlines on arthouse, but isn't.Oh, and there are multiple hints at potential plot developments that go nowhere. Are they intentional red herrings? We'll never know, because the acting was so poor you don't know if some implications were accidental. Either way, any of those red herrings panning out would have made for a more interesting plot.Maybe one day there'll be a reboot that makes it all work.

reviews.review_title: Worst Sci Fi I've seen in years and I love Sci Fi
reviews.content:
Writing terrible
Acting terrible
Cinematography terrible
Choreography terrible
Special effects terrible
Timing/editing terribleThere's absolutely nothing positive to say about this.

I have been watching this movie for alomst a week now. I watch a lil part everyday from how much awful it is. I can just simply pass it, but I am trying to find anything good about it. It is terrible. This is really a cosmic sin, it is a sin to do something this awful. Bruce, stay away from such cheap movies. I am considering that you were not in that movie. That girl specially, Adelaide Kane... What on Earth are you?! Girl you cannot act at all I give you a big Zero and I give the movie -10!!!

reviews.review_title: I saw it. I can't unsee it.
reviews.content: It reads like a story which was written by an eleven year old on crack. I'm pretty sure all of the actors had to be heavily sedated to get them to make this flick, which explains the absolutely deadpan and wooden performances given by all involved. All of the FX in the world can't distract from the gaping plot holes, and this is coming from a guy who grew up on Battlestar Galactica (76) and Buck Rogers. They could've at least found their way clear to toss in some cheesecake.

reviews.review_title: Never thought Bruce Willis could participate in a film this bad.
reviews.content:
I'm a sci-fi movies fan, and usually I wasn't so cocky about acting.
Just a decent one would do. Or a good story, or decent visual effect.
But this movie, it has none.
No good acting, no good story, no good special effect. Nothing.
And "no good" here you can literally translate it to very bad.Really, never thought Bruce Willis could participate in a film this bad. Such a shame.

reviews.review_title: You have got to be kidding me!
reviews.content: Train journey to London so thought I would download this. It has Bruce Willis in and sounded like it could be quite good.Well, from the word go this acting is simply terrible, I mean awful! The story - first 10 mins I thought, yeah I can get over the acting it sounds interesting, wrong, really wrong. It is a load of rubbish so much so I turned it off after an hour.It is cheesy, shallow, boring with actor development, no depth, nothing. The best thing about this was when I turned it off.I can get onboard with brain dead chewing gum movies, even enjoy them but there is nothing entertaining at all.Do yourself a favour if you are thinking about watching this, watch paint dry instead. Much more entertaining!

reviews.review_title: First half was alright, then second half went nowhere
reviews.content: The first half was watchable, but the second half just really anti-climatic and boring.

reviews.review_title: Should have been an anime series
reviews.content: I didn't think it was completely terrible, but I did find that it was trying to do too much at once. Thus, it did none of it particularly well.I did like some of what it was talking about when it came to the morality and fight for survival, and it was the kind of drama story I would expect from an anime. Maybe in a long format, where characters could have been developed and long stretches of dialogue were expected, this would be really good.But I mostly forgot about this as soon as I finished, except for what the title meant. And how much I wanted it to remove most of the action and stick to the drama.

Grillo and Willis, why did you say yes to this? I like Grillo, but from now on, I won't pay to say a movie starring Grillo before checking IMDB. This is probably one of the worst movies I have ever seen. The acting is very, very, very bad, and what is supposed to be cool techgear in 2524 looks like something bought in a toystore. And also, who wrote this crap? That person should not make any more screenplays.

reviews.review_title: When corporate people turn art into product
reviews.content: We all know about EFO and Randall Emett films but omg these Bondit people who keep churning these films out over and over just slapping names on re-tread films is killing the industry. I mean I get it, we want films to be made and maybe the studio space left a vaccum but this constant barrage of films that are "similar" to other films shot in 5-7 days with no prep no story is crazy! But when you can make money int he shadows like these guys do thats why you keep seeing 45 executive producers for a film shot in a weekend. Edward drake did 8 of these in a year-- 8!! HOW! Cosmic sin is another example of guys with no talent and access to daddys hedge funds funding films and taking photos on set to make them look important... sad really what they did to bruce.

There is no connection between any scenes.I want to write some bad words, but my review policy blocks me. I should have avoided this movie.

Acting: Wooden

Cosmic Sin is a total Sin to watch! Absolute Tosh! Don't even bother!A very bad film with everything bad going for it!Bruce Willis - I think it's time to retire!-10 out of 10 Stars for this Sinful Crock of Dog Doodoo!

It's truly a mystery how a movie this low-grade gets not one but two recognizable stars attached to it. There are points where it honestly felt like I was watching a Syfy made-for-TV original. The plot is paper-thin and the characters are just collections of standard movie clichés that you've seen a thousand times before. You'd think it would have at least been made with some mind-blowing special effects to compensate for those shortcomings, but no! The special effects in this look cheap and nowhere near up to the quality you'd expect for a major release in 2021. I've seen demos done by aspiring SFX artists on their home computer that look better than Cosmic Sin.

Wow! Stunningly horrible movie. This movie has a 2.5 rating and even that's too much...clearly Bruce Willis is dead broke and can't say no to a paycheck. No wonder he lashed out at that reporter who was giving him an interview...he probably just watched "Cosmic Sin"

So many things about this movie just didn't make sense. A couple that stood out:500 years in the future and yet nearly everything was the same, well except for being able to teleport into space with suits.The earth is supposedly united by an alliance, yet only a small group of people in the military seem to have known about making first contact.One of the characters get hit with some kind of space debris at high speeds and survives. Another character gets shot in the shoulder with a bullet, wearing the same suit, and ends up bleeding out. You're telling me there was no advancements to medical technologies?

reviews.review_title: Better than his last two films but
reviews.content: It's so strange and tragic to see a Hollywood icon and A lister like Bruce Willis end up in straight to DVD movies. He's one of my favourite all time actors so having heard the news of his retirement this week I decided to check out his new (not quite his last) movie. I had seen his last two movies - which were also low budget straight to DVD - and this is clearly a level up from those thankfully. That said it's still not very good and if it didn't have Willis and to a lesser extent the reliable Frank Grillo as headline cast I doubt anyone would even watch it.

It's not often that I can honetly say that I could make a better movie than this. Today I actually get to say I could easily write a better script, make a motorbike look slightly more futuristic and possibly even act better.Bruce Willis looks like he doesn't want to be there and is probably only taking this for a quick payday (money for private yacht fuel?). The plot barely exists and what little of it does exist makes no sense (particurlarly an early scene regarding aliens attacking a military base). The costume department was apparently supplied by TopShop. Finally, if you don't know how to write a script, it's apparently obligatory to drop the "F-bomb" as many times as possible to make up for the lack of talent.

The script is like a piece of Swiss cheese: full of holes and seems like someone affected by deficit attention syndrome wrote it.Bruce Willis tried to make a nice job, but with those lines? Man not even Marlon Brando could have turned it into a decent character!Despite some action and a running time of 1:27 it feels so slow that you beg for it to finish sooner!Cosmic BS.

reviews.review_title: A movie shouldn't be so bad that you hate yourself for watching it
reviews.content: Bruce doesn't even try anymore just shows up for the check apparently he doesn't get embarrassed by his lack of effort and moves onto the next POS movie As for the rest of the effort Put into this dumpster fire I guess it's better than waiting tables

reviews.review_title: 2,5/10 for the moment - and spot on
reviews.content: Well, the good things first. I like Lochlyn Munro. I like Bruce Willis. This is turning into I used to like Bruce Willis though. I like Sci-fi. The visuals and colors are great.Is it enough?Well...no.Just about everything else was bad - not an 'outright bad', but in the sense that there was a perpetual feeling of wasting time and confusion watching this, and the movie failed to capture me in any way. I wouldn't recommend this one even as a popcorn flick.

My god, Bruce - WHY?Empty. Hollow. Stoopid.Five hundred years from now, when we have advanced space travel and other techno goodies, we still drive Ford F-150s with internal combustion engines? Or use gunpowder and lead handguns? Or drive ancient Harley Davidson two-wheeled tractors? I could go on, but I won't. The cosmic sin is that this ever got made.You have been warned.
Has Willis lost all his money??? Can't think of any other reason he would agree to be in such a poor film....Don't waste your time, story line is rubbish, acting is worse....

reviews.review_title: The Sin was making this movie
reviews.content: Any review i read about this movie was more entertaining than the movie per se. There are a lot of movies that are so bad that you get angry with yourself for wasting your time and you feel regret for not going to the gim or cleaning the house instead, but this is in a league of his own.Without spoilers (even though, if you like watching alien movies, you already saw everything this movie try to tell), this movie is just a weird mix of bits of differet alien movies, a lot of cliches and a black hole full of cringe from bad actors.I'm not kidding, there is a scene at the beginning where they take 10 min to suit up, so you just watching 10 min of guys putting on some clothes. I'm pretty sure real astronauts take less.PS. Don't know what happened to Bruce Willis and his career, but it doesn't look so good for him.

Bad story, bad plot, poor special effects, bad acting, bad character design, cheap costume designs and materials. This movie was as bad as Titan. Worst movie of 2021. I can hardly believe I was able to finish it.

reviews.review_title: Bruce must of lost a bet.
reviews.content: No words to describe this movie, but I must admit, a perfect sleeper for an afternoon nap.
If someone asks you to watch this movie, tell them you're busy cleaning your fridge magnets. The 'Director' should also be charged with some form of terrorism. Truly.

I gave Cosmic Sin two stars because I still like Bruce and I like Frank Grillo. It wasn't THAT bad.The worst movie Bruce has done, in my opinion, is Air Strike. Youch!I'll be watching Bruce's cheap-o hour and a half gems as he continues adding to his retirement fund.

reviews.review_title: Rating it a 1 seems to much
reviews.content: Just terrible from start to finish the whole think is put together in a mess

reviews.review_title: Bruce Willis truly has committed a Cosmic Sin starring in this rubbish
reviews.content: Bruce Willis hasn't really made a good movie in years and has continued that trend with this rubbish, I guess old habits Die Hard, If only he had a Sixth Sense when it came to movie scripts, I can only think he has signed up to make as many bad movies as possible and breaking that trend would be a Breach of contract, and the studio has him held Hostage, when it comes to his career he seems to have a Death Wish.He doesn't even try to put in a good effort into a movie anymore and every performance is a Cop-Out.He has committed career Armageddon starring in this rubbish that is for sure.
Mindless plot with woeful acting, hoping to redeem itself with some big screen names. The clothing, American V8 utes, and weapons from the 20th century in the 26th century?

I wish I could enjoy how bad it was but it's just too frustrating. I can't remember the last time I turned a movie off without finishing it.The year is supposed to be 2524..
Everyone drives 90's cars, the guns are normal, cellphones, clothes.. The "Q-Bomb" (worlds most powerful weapon) is a piece of glass with a standard Phillips screw inside. I'm not kidding.Every prop, set, costume is incredibly unbelievable and everything looks cheap. It's so so bad.The script is atrocious, every scene is painful to watch.I don't know if Bruce Willis could ever really act, he is not acting in this film..
The story is offensive.The first encounter the ailens look unworldy and then they are just regular humans with a head twitch.Nine of them, unarmed and walking like zombies take over a military base, the cast then travel 13 lightyears away through space flying only wearing some plastic on their torsos.Again, this is not "so bad it's good" it's just bad, it's time you will never get back, time that is better spent elsewhere.

reviews.review_title: Man, How Far Bruce Willis Has Fallen
reviews.content: This is one of those movies that spends all its budget securing a fading megastar to attract viewers. I didn't watch, however, because of Bruce; I watched it because of Frank Grillo, who has churned out a few lesser known B-movie gems in the past that earned my admiration. Unfortunately, this movie is not one of them. Pairing Bruce and Frank with this movie is like icing a turd, yeah, it looks pretty from a distance, but get close and it still stinks. Bad plot, bad FX, and bad acting make a bad movie. Skip this one.

Such a stupid movie. Don't waste your time. Actors your efforts in this film are cute, but there's something or several somethings which undermine the whole thing. Lingering in slow annoying dialog with stupid ominous over the top music inappropriately place throughout. No real adequate thought put toward the future, the most futuristic thing in the movie looks like a laser-tag vest. The CGI is C-Class in that it feels so separate from the actors on screen, and then those ridiculous cheap SFX start again, every second there has to be some overworked SFX or dramatic music! It's reaally not that dramatic. I really feel like a movie can sometimes waste their budget on a big name actor and this is one of those. It's poorly designed and implemented which is a shame, but hopefully some of them had fun making it.

reviews.review_title: Actually a good movie compared to recent 2020-2021 sci-fi
reviews.content: This movie actually does present a good plot. Compared to most movies out there that starts with humans coming face to face with an evil alien race, this movie starts from the middle.That first contact already happened, they dropped a bomb that creates a black hole and 70 million lives were wiped out. This movie takes place after that tragic event. The humans now have a better understanding of the alien race and what they're capable of. So they set in place the "Cosmic Sin" protocol.Although the movie fails at making the action scenes interesting, they do help a lot at progressing the plot. What would have been better was that the movie would have spend more time expanding on the lore and background of the whole story.

The Worst piece of sh..it i ever seen. Bruce Willis is so tired in tjos role its Almis funny,the Actors are the sadest bunch i ever seen,the script is a joke. This can be the Turkey of the year. And yes im a sci-fi fan...

reviews.review_title: Ohh dear lord save us all
reviews.content: If this is the future!Forget about the laughable dialogue, the unnecessary words muttered between different species who are still in homo sapien flesh, the ridiculous voice from the exorcist movie from the 80? 90's? The toy suits the soldiers were wearing, the google earth planets, Bad CGI effects, so fake , Bruce willis acting the worst action movie ever, he seemed mentally disabled like he never acted before or Frank Grillo! Frank Grillo making the most ridiculous appearance I have ever seen floating in space blowing himself up for mankind when the aliens were still on earth fighting the war with Bruce who somehow survives the blowup, and so much more cringe unbelievable things You havent seen anything like this yet. Like Actors you never heard of and a country song in the end that makes you cringe and trembe of embarrassment. A 5 second "battle" and everyone wiped out then back in restaurants still wearing their ridiculous toy suits.Hahaha I cant, but what I really want to say, sorry went a bit off there, is remember all the reviews written here on IMDB that made me laugh my ass off! They are so good, so well written, so well described! Trust the rating this time. Otherwise it is kind of misleading but on this movie the reviews are top notch.

I just saw the trailer and was completely put off ! I love my sci-fi but the buck definitely stops here , and I WAS a Bruce Willis fan until I saw the rubbish movies he's willing to do to pull a pay check. A man's gotta eat though I guess .

Thank god this was free with my Netflix subscription... while I understand early on during the pandemic corners and budgets may have had to been cut to provide a safe work environment but really? I can only hope that this will be the last release effected by those circumstances because any other excuse would be nonsense. The bad acting, poor set design, Xbox 360 worthy special effects, shoddy storyline, and otherwise poor example of a sci-fi thriller casting both Frank Grillo and Bruce Willis make Plan 9 from Outer Space look like James Cameron's Avatar. 1 star for Mr. Grillo, 1 star for Mr. Willis, and 1 star for the effort made by the production team rounds out this more than forgiving 3 star review.

I wanted to love this, trailer was great! In fact the trailer was better than the film as it had oomph! The editing of this just didn't work, it was lacking substance, I couldn't put my finger on it as the actors were all great and they all did a great job, effects were good enough, at some points it felt a bit TV sci-fi but still acceptable. I think it was just lacking atmosphere, possibly lacking background effects or music to build suspense or a sense of mood, I'm not willing to watch it again to figure it out. 😬😂

reviews.review_title: So much wrong with this where to begin
reviews.content: BW, kudos, another film... But seriously, it's tough but is it that tough? This one could well have been a hard pass...What's the year? 25-anything? And they are only now discovering the classic oil spitting body snatchers from Mars? That is their FC event, "then"? Right, whatever...Then they simply let them on base. Not one of them, not even in traction, no med-techs, nothing. And not just one of them but an entire freaking squadron of them! Right, whatever...And the commandant lady trying to figure out, is this a "negative" for either species. Really? Seems pretty flipping negative for the body snatched, choreographed TWITCHING squadron, right!It is bad, and that was just the first 20 or so minutes.
I will never get back 90 minutes of my life.The base idea could have worked, but.. nah it is bad.
This movie is nothing when compared with Bruce Willis another science fiction film "The Fifth Element". And it is a real sin to waste time by watching this movie.

Embarrassing on every level.Ground scenes shot in some boring leafless backlot forest, while using hand weaponry that looks like something you can buy at Walmart next week, not hundreds of years in the future.This Tel-Aviv/Hong Kong Saban Films fiasco - more a real estate, Asian film distribution and investment firm than anything else - is 100% cringe-worthy.As for Corey Large - normally it appears he's a producer of sorts - and his "writing" of this thing, at least he had the junk to also "act" in it so convinced was he that it was good on some level. He knows better now.Wrap all this up with the clause Willis seemingly has in his acting contract that he won't go over 100 words of dialogue in a movie.(Nice to get millions for an amount of words you could easily write on your forearm.)Oddly enough even thespian talents like Wayne Gretzky and Tommy Lees' sons aren't sufficient to save this bowl of curdled cinematic yogurt. Go figure.Apparently Netflix is more than happy to throw in absolutely anything to feed it's huge streaming content grinder.

What is wrong with people??? This may have been a perfectly good SF movie, but it was unwatchable from the word Go, thanks entirely to shaky cam work. Decades of steady cam benefits have been casually thrown out for something that literally makes me schedule a visit to a neurologist because someone thought it would be avante garde to make me think I suddenly had tremors. Tip to director: people's eyes and brains don't wobble around like that in real life. Not unless you're in an earthquake.Don't believe me? Watch the trailer.No thanks.

reviews.review_title: Feels like an amateur made fulm
reviews.content: It's a mess of a movie. It's like high school students made it. Storyline is weak ... it could have been better.

reviews.review_title: This product commits the biggest Sin
reviews.content:
It's frustratingly boring.GOOFS: This entire audio-visual product.Holy smokes, it was even worse than I thought.
Every person that worked on this thing, music, editing, """acting""", just sucked.Hoffman from Saw was watchable. He was the least bad thing about this product. But he dies relatively early.

They didn't have the budget for space ships, so the characters fly through space in space suits... which are just shoulder pads and leg guards on top of street clothes??? Wasn't even laughably bad, just bad. Hope the actors got paid well, as they must need money.

This movie is so obviously bad. It makes 99% of the critics look like experts. Ok that's the movie. The critics disappointed in Willis and Grillo? Do you know any well known actors that didn't make a bad movie in their career? Perhaps they are lending their names as a leg up to some lesser experienced colleagues. Who knows? Everybody needs to start somewhere? I watched it twice. I'm a Frank Grillo fan plus I forgot I watched it already lol. I don't think Bruce was that bad. He didn't have much of a part to work with. Neither did Frank. The audio could have been better. So could the plot and the directing. I've definitely seen worse and it's not hard to find better. 2 years into covid and content is getting thin. The internet churns out tons of dodgy stuff so it's not hard to find something to be negative about. Narrow opinions and short sighted views abound. I like a bad movie with a friendly face more than just a bad movie so it's worth at least one star. This one has two. Watch it or don't watch it. I don't care. 2 stars in the movie and 2 stars for the movie and 2 times watching it after 2 years of pandemic. Hope you at least enjoyed my review. Bows and exits.
500+ years in the future: internal combustion engine cars, manual lock and load guns, today's clothing. This is when I decided to let this movie run its course, it without me.

reviews.review_title: Oh boy.. poor Bruce .. need some money ?
reviews.content: Unfortunately I have to think up enough words to meet the necessary minimum character limit. Where to start? Mmm... crappolla.. sci fi garbage... millennial generation excreta... ah poor Bruce, I knew ye well. I haven't a clue who wrote the script, if there was a script. ?? In the year 2525 we still drive 2017 pickup trucks and use Glock 9 mm pistols ? Perhaps this was an attempt to make some social commentary... then again perhaps not. Here's what to do .. get a quart of Johnny Walker red..popcorn, peanuts ( your choice) and start watching this movie with a loaded handgun on your lap, and if you are able to watch this movie in its entirety.. without shooting either yourself or the tv .. or your family dog, then you would probably be able to endure anything, torture, a second Biden term .. , let's just hope "..no sequel "!

...but it very quickly went down hill. I went in knowing this was a geezer teezer so my expectations for Willis's contribution to this movie would be low but he did have a decent amount of screen time.It faces the standard "low budget sci fi" issue. They go to an alien planet, in the same way Stargate SG-1 went in the 90s. They walk around the woods for awhile and sometimes there is a bit of fog.The "aliens" are first introduced in the dark so you can't see anything at all. Attacking a planet where we are specifically told only 2 people live as a forward mining post but the "survivors are brought back to earth" and there are suddenly 8 of them. They walk in lock step, covered in alien sores, growling, turn their heads at the exact same time. The second they appeared on screen it was obvious they were enemies. It takes 3 minutes of this before the elite soldiers notice though.We will get a scene of a fleet battle in space very briefly but it's the first time we've seen a space ship so we have no idea who is winning, who is losing and how there is a battle going on when they only attacked a mining post with 2 people on it.It wasn't enjoyably bad or anything. Acting was passable for most people and the CGI was "fine". It's just too dull and confusing to be fun.

Just to see how far Bruce Willis has fallen from being an A-lister.
There is no acting in this film, they all just walked through it.
AWFUL!

I'm just here to say that this movie is amazing. Great actors and acting from everyone on this movie. Brilliant story and excellent visual effects and action scenes combined with funny and also sad moments.
Its worth watching.

reviews.review_title: This looked cool at first and then I watched some of it
reviews.content: The acting is horrific and the space armor suites are literally made of cut up milk jugs. Why in 2021 are movies this bad?

As someone who loves Sci-Fi movies, i cant get over this one... bad acting, bad writing. Why would you came up with such an idea, and even if i could live with that idea, why would you convert that idea like that in a movie.Save your time and watch your wall, which might have a better story telling quality.

reviews.review_title: Damn, this film is so Bad, that i want to puke
reviews.content: I skip and fast forwarded this film so many times, just to skip the bad acted of the actors. I dont understand, what the hell were the producers think to launch this film, no clear storyline, bad acting, etc... and the worst thing is, bruce took this movie, what a shame. Maybe he was so desperated and has no money, so he acted in this total sh**t film.. Damn.

reviews.review_title: I love Sci-fi I'm not sure what this was.
reviews.content: This is what happens when you spend the complete movie budget on two decent actors and leave nothing else for the rest of the movie. This movie literally dies hard and fast. I'm not sure if this is sci-fi or why-try. Give this a hard pass.

Watching this now.....turned off Bruce Willis about 5 movies ago....I find his so called acting very wooden....watching on my 4k 75 inch screen Willis walks around with that same blank look on his face and no emotion whatsoever...lotsa gunfire...there we go Bruce kills all the enemies in one shot where 20 soldiers with guns didnt get anywhere.....its all been done before just hope Bruce dies at or hopefully before the films 88 minutes run out....I dont think I will last the full run time

What the heck bruce? You would expect a movie with your face on the cover to be above average, aven if it's a cliché, but now it's BAD in every possible way: screenplay, camera is all over the place, acting is horrendous, .. looks like a low budget tv film. What an absolute shame..
There are bad movies that are a complete waste of time to watch, then there is Cosmic Sin.
A precious hour of my life as been successful wasted watching this video.

If you see his name attached to any film project you know it's going to be a waste of eye muscle movement to bother sitting thru it.I guess he's just taking the money but I hardly see how much longer films will get a green light based on his past films.We'll miss him when he's dead but til then....
No idea what I just watched. Decided to watch to the end to see if it gets better. It did not.

I would rate it lower if I could. The story seems to be one rejected from the worse of adult films. Absolutely confused and disjointed.I couldn't actually supply a spoiler because that would assume there was a plot to spoil.

reviews.review_title: Why did i watched this. (Cosmic Sin Review)
reviews.content:
Well,i must admit i was a little hyped for the movie watching the trailer,i was expecting to be a good movie,an epic action movie,and i did see this on theaters........
Cosmic Sin,the one of the literally worst movies ever made in the history.This movie is LITERALLY FULL OF BORING CONVERSATION,AND TOO OVERUSED SCENES,Too bad acting,boring scenes that are too overused,and yes! This movie IS in the IMDB's infamous Bottom 100 list and its on #39.It deserves it? Yes,very much
i dont even need to give any of the things on this movie an note,because everything is 0/10.0/10.
Do yourself a favor and ignore the existence of this utter blank smelly rubbish.

Nothing to add that hasn't already been stated by other reviewers. If you are VERY bored and there is NOTHING else to watch, it can pass the time. But, the plot is cliche and disjointed, cheap sets and props, typical characters. Plot skips so you do not know how one character wound up where they were, one minute the aliens cannot be killed without a head shot, next they can. Gunpowder powered pistols still being used 5 centuries from now...the list goes on. Bruce has a new worth of $250 million, he doesn't need the money, so why be remembered for something like this hot mess? Bruce, Bruce, Bruce. Say it ain't so, Bruce. I've been a huge fan from Moonlighting through Die Hard and beyond; but, Bruce is just sleepwalking through this one.

Reserved this film on initial promo. Like the genre. Was this going to be a return to form for Bruce?? Then reviews so poor that I decided not to take the risk....but I bodged the cancellation........Woah, how did I get to the end?? Watch this at your peril. An hour and a half of your life you will never get back. Bruce, you gave us Diehard, 12 Monkeys, Pulp Fiction, Unbreakable, Sixth Sense, Looper and more, what are you playing at mate??? 100's of reasons why this is soo awful but can't waste another breath on this tosh.

I have to ask, HOW did they get Bruce Willis to be in this thing?It's awful from start to well, I didn't finish watching it because I realised I had some paint drying in another room, so I went to watch that instead.You can do much better Bruce.

Unfortunately Cosmic Sin was a bit garbage and if not for Covid having smashed the movie industry for a year this would never have had a cinema release. The trailer looked ok and Bruce Willis is a fan favourite but that's about where the positives end. I mean they fly through space wearing a suit which consists of elbow and knee pads, gloves and boots, a plastic chest plate and a helmet which has a force field (covering only their faces) that looks like it could fail at any moment. Utter garbage. Everything about this movie screams B-grade and that's being generous. Personally I'd recommend giving it a miss. Cheers.
One of the worst movies I have ever seen. Terrible story, acting, costumes, special effect, sound.

So space command gets a "possible first contact"with an alien species...and without any knowledge whatsoever beyond that they decide they absolutely must get Sir Nukes A Lot to advise them since they have no plans or competent people to handle these sorts of things.So they send a soldier who thinks the best way to get Sir Nukes back from retirement to help them is to antagonize him with his history of nuking people...which oddly works because it transformed his "no" to a subsequent "yes" just because...he likes being antagonized?So he gets there and, without any information, advises them to...get a nuke.If none of that makes any sense...that's because it doesn't. And that was just the first 5 minutes.

reviews.review_title: wow.. can so much money be spent on something so crap?
reviews.content: First 5 mins and you see things like jukeboxes, motorcycles , cars from the 20th century! WHAT? This is set in 2542 or something?Total joke and an embarrassment. The "armour" suits they had on looked like halloween costumes made by school kids. Another paycheque film for Willis. I can't believe he would like to be associated to this .. unbelievable.

reviews.review_title: Comic Sin, sad but true. Watch at your own risk
reviews.content:
Not gonna beat around the bush. Love Bruce Willis, but this move is absolutely bad, with respect to the lack of:1. Acting, nearly non-existent
2. Content, the story line is seriously poor
3. Imagination, check 2 above
4. Props and costumes and CGI, all badI should pretty much give this a 2, but I do love Bruce, especially in the SNL skit Boy Dance Party.... the Alien in that looks scarier than the ones in this move... SIGH!

Ok let me first say it's definitely a B movie. I am wondering if Bruce Willis or maybe one of his kids wrote this. Why is Bruce Willis in this movie? I saw Bruce Willis and 2021 creation date and space sifi. I thought this will probably be a good waste of a few hours. Bruce Willis is in it can't be bad and probably has a $50+ million dollar budget because he gets paid a lot of money now.Sadly this movie was not great. As others have said their entire budget must have gone to Bruce Willis and then they had like $200k left over to make the rest of the movie.

Bruce, Bruce,Bruce..WHY???The story is horrendously executed, the dialogue is cringy at best, and nothing makes sense.I could have spent the time watching this crap better if I was chainsawing my teeth instead.

reviews.review_title: Four stars for the music and the actors , and the electricity spent to make it
reviews.content: It is well shot, the aliens are credible. Good actors are in ont. But the characters are weak anyway and more than that, the story is more than feable. It is as if Starship troopers had been made without sarcasm. First contact is good, but first to shoot is better. And that's it.We have the same idea in Star Strek Discovery for exemple, but it was just the beginning of a more profound analysis. In this movie, it started as the beginning ... and ended the same way.I am a bit sad as I liked the casting.Next time, please work on the characters, the plot, the rationale of all this.Ah, may be this movie has been ordered by Trump ? 😈

reviews.review_title: The most intense sequence of errors and unconsistencies ever
reviews.content: One every 10 sec during 84 minutes. That's insane! Everything is wrong! The characters, the logic, the wrong order of events, the dialogues, the guns, the shaking camera, the disastrous military acting... The laser shooting noises in space as bad as they could be 70 years ago. The enemy planet -you can see in the trailer- is told to be 600k light years away from earth despite our galaxy being 100k light years in diameter.

Brandon Thomas Lee should never work as an actor again. Don't care who his parents are, dude is terrible. I am the guy that is known for watching any movie, no matter how bad it is. This was simply horrible. The writing was almost as bad. These stupid one liners that were supposed to be funny had an absolutely horrific delivery. Frank and Bruce had to habe been coerced into making this. Their kids were being held hostage or something.

And the props department couldn't even be bothered to complete some of the soldiers uniforms.It's basically some half assed costumes, and warehouses posing as space ships.A very poor script. Not even TV worthy. 0 humour. Garbage action.Go watch the expanse !!!! And be amazed.The only good thing is Bruce Willis and the fond memories you have of some of the movies he has made. Come on Bruce !!! Stop lending yourself out like this to rubbish.

reviews.review_title: Avoid this... Even if it's the LAST movie in the cosmos
reviews.content: I just wanted to warn any other poor soul who may have been conned into believing this was anything beyond sub par action filming. It deserves zero stars. Is Willis having some form of aging dilemmas? He literally speaks only a handful of times as if this is his last hoorah of some sort. Cosmic Sin has absolutely zero storyline. Zilch. Nothing. Maybe COVID caused writing, filming, location, and acting issues?? I have literally been watching this movie off and on for 8 hours because I try to finish anything I start (personal issues). It's torture. Just don't. 😣😫😭

Bruce Willis versus zombies from space? I guess Bruce's health is continuing to seriously deteriorated, because he's making some extremely poor decisions. Gilbert Godfrey would make a better star in this movie. Bruce Die Hard was a good movie, but not a life mission.

I still cannot understand why Willis, megastar of the 80s, continues to play In such rubbish films and by now he's still doing it. It can be for the money. This film fails on all counts, it's embarrassing.

Can't really give a review as there aren't the words to describe this steaming pile
Do not waste the precious minutes of life it would need to confirm how awful this is.

reviews.review_title: Really? R e a l l y ?
reviews.content: No words really. I don't know if this movie suffered COVID-19 but, it sure seems like it had it while filming, creating and producing it.Just bad.

This is probably the sci-fi movie with the smallest budget in the history of cinema. Or there is another with a smaller budget from the same company that made this one. Haha! One wonders where to start with the negatives. Everything looks like some absurd cosplay, there are even cosplays with a bigger budget. The script was written by a small child under 5 years old. In fact, I don't want to offend the children, they probably even have more intelligence than the person who wrote the script. There are so many holes in the script that it's just a big black hole. Haha! And if you're thinking of watching this movie because of Bruce Willis or Frank Grillo, you better not. They have only a few lines as a background for the film. And apparently almost the entire budget of the film has gone to shoot the above-mentioned stars.

reviews.review_title: Why do producers keep making these movies?!
reviews.content: I gave up on Bruce Willis a while ago unfortunately, but I had just discovered Franck Grillo in Boss Level and he did such a great acting job I thought I would give this one a shot.The acting, or rather, the direction for the acting makes no sense from the beginning. Reactions of characters facing situations are totally incoherent. The dialogues are rock bottom, I'm talking middle school level at best. The interactions are mindless (especially since it involves a lot of military folks who respect neither the enemy nor their superiors), even the scenery is bad! I can't think of anything, objectively, that wasn't cringey at best during the entire 20 minutes of watching this piece of trash. And I am really infuriated, because my 3 old niece could have done a better job at directing this thing, and I will never get those 20 minutes back.Stop producing garbage, I beg of you!
Poor story, poor effects, poor acting and just an horrendous abomination of sci-fi. The script made no sense and was directionless. This gig signals the end Bruce's star power. It has ended.

This is one of those movies where they secured the budget for the effects but forgot to leave anything over to finish the script. It feels like they went with the spec script. The dialog cannot even be ranked as atrocious. It's far worse. Bruce Willis didn't so much as phone this in; it's more like he emailed it a week before. He's doing that thing he often does these days where he looks like he knows he won't have fun and just commits to dead face and saying the lines at the appropriate time.As for the story. It's not told well at all. It feels like there are scenes missing, or someone forgot a voiceover. It just goes from random happening to all-out war with some unknown something. I'm used to movies where we know as much as the actors. In this movie, I get the horrible feeling that we know less than they do. We're left in the dark most of the time. Again, the feeling that scenes were left unfilmed, or edited out completely.The effects are passable. The scenery, what there is, is just a warehouse in Georgia and a bar set (probably at the same location). The rest of the time we're somewhere in the woods (probably in Georgia again).I get that this is a budget movie, but better movies have been made, and probably for less. This is quite simply a tragic mess. The script, the direction, the editing. It's all subpar. I do hope Netflix didn't pay too much for it.
In no way this movie should have been released.I lack the vocabulary to describe how bad the acting, the light settings, the cut, the dialogue..

I tried to give it a chance.
Did not read reviews on forehand to stay unbiased.
I gave up after 20 minutes. This is utter crap.
Bad acting, bad scenery and the most annoying part is the film makers made the assumption the viewers have a sun 80 IQ.
The decisions made by the characters are so awfully dumb they make you doubt your own life....

Awful film. Why does Bruce Willis, who must be wealthy by now, get involved in such terrible movies? Is that the best he can get? Surely not. This movie belongs on a list of "Movies that should not have been made, but were anyway." Did someone have too much money and wanted to pay less tax? :-) I'm disappointed Bruce. You should have better things to do with your time.
I liked the story line, effects were decent, but not gory without purpose. It was an enjoyable diversion for a bit.

reviews.review_title: It was a Sin to sit through this movie.
reviews.content: Really Bruce Willis? What were you thinking?Apparently in the year 2550 mankind has not progressed at all. We are still driving around in gas vehicles. Sexism in the military runs rampant. We rush to war without first seeking to understand. First contact means we must immediately drop the space equivalent of the Hiroshima bomb on the enemy without so much as a conversation.The movie could have been written by a 15 year old. The dialogue sounded like two teenagers talking to each other. No imagination what so ever. The year 2550 looks oddly like 2021 with some slight modifications. Well, aside from the space travel of course. But when our cast lands on an alien planet it looks like they landed in the Appalachian woods.Why did I waste an hour or so on a Sunday afternoon watching this? Instead, I could have painted a wall that didn't need to be painted and watched the paint dry.Bruce Willis has been an plenty of good moves. This is far from one of them. Pass on it.

reviews.review_title: The new number 1 on my trash list
reviews.content: Bruce: I wanna play a character that's really baaaad!Writer: I can do you one better, I got a whole movie that's really baaaad!Bruce: I'm in!

By far the worst of the worst.Literally nothing is good about this film. Plot sucks, if there's any. Actors, barely acting. Enemy, sooooooo cliché and lame. Graphics is AWFUL. Make-up is sh*****t.And the worst part, the movie supposed to be 500 years in the future, and somehow we still use yesterday's technology.A total waste of time.
There was no reason for this to have been made. Bruce Willis is trashing a long and proud career in this travesty. Shame in him and shame on Netflix for airing it.

reviews.review_title: Anything over a 2 star rating is too much
reviews.content: This movie is very bad. I thought since it had Bruce Willis I would give it a shot without checking here first. Big mistake. I gave it two stars but I really considered one.

reviews.review_title: Couldn't make myself watch it to the end
reviews.content:
Willis became a mark of garbage movie.This movie is so cheap and pointless.The cameraman was drunk or so. The characters are wooden and dumb.
Reducing the budget they made all the flick shoot in super closeup, so you can't understand what's going on on the screen.Don't waste your time. It's garbage.

reviews.content:
Don't be nice
This is the death or B grade Bruce
No self respect
This is as bad as it get folks.Don't be nice

This is as bad as it get folks.Don't be nice

This is as bad as it get folks.Don't be nice
